message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested but I'm only willing to pay $95 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher than your offer. I could be persuaded to part with it for $105.
